thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 26 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-JBT Corp Reports Q4 Adjusted EPS $1.10 From Continuing Operations

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-JBT Corp Reports Q4 Adjusted EPS $1.10 From Continuing Operations
text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - John Bean Technologies Corp:
* JBT CORPORATION REPORTS FULL-YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.61 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 19 PERCENT * SEES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.85 TO $4.05 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* SEES Q1 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.32 TO $0.36 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.10 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE UP 10 TO 13 PERCENT * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE UP ABOUT 8 PERCENT * QTRLY REVENUE $483.7 MILLION VERSUS $405.0 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.08, REVENUE VIEW $470.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $3.72, REVENUE VIEW $1.77 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* JOHN BEAN TECHNOLOGIES - SEES NEW RESTRUCTURING PROGRAM IN 2018, DETAILS AND IMPACT OF WHICH WILL BE AVAILABLE AT TIME OF Q1 2018 EARNINGS RELEASE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
